channel.title: CVE Feed for looswebstudio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for looswebstudio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2795|2024-07-02T19:25:40.357Z -- looswebstudio -- seo%20simple%20pack
item.description: The SEO SIMPLE PACK plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.1 via META description. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract limited information about password protected posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-2795|2024-06-28T06:57:46.802Z -- looswebstudio -- seo%20simple%20pack
item.description: The SEO SIMPLE PACK plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.1 via META description. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract limited information about password protected posts.
